alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 4:14PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER PRODUCING GUSTY WIND AND SMALL HAIL WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EST... At 413 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower producing hail along a line extending from near Reading to Ephrata. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Ephrata, Akron, Reamstown, Rothsville, Terre Hill, Churchtown, Bowmansville, Fivepointville, Blue Ball and Goodville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
